column4: However, startup manager only affects the GRUB bootloader. So I looked up the Wubi FAQ to figure out what bootloader Wubi used.
Turned out it was the Windows bootloader, and I had to go to Control Panel ->  System -> advanced -> startup and recovery
did you try checking boot.ini file  :)
i switched to vista long time ago so i may be incorrect but you can configure windows xp bootloader by editing c:\boot.ini most of the time i think ;)
